com.aionemu.gameserver.services
Class PlayerService

java.lang.Object
  com.aionemu.gameserver.services.PlayerService

public class PlayerService
extends java.lang.Object

This class is designed to do all the work related with loading/storing players.
Same with storing, storePlayer(com.aionemu.gameserver.model.gameobjects.player.Player) stores all player data like appearance, items, etc...

Author:
SoulKeeper, Saelya

playerLoggedIn

public static void playerLoggedIn(Player player)
This method is called just after player logged in to the game.

NOTICE: This method called only from CM_ENTER_WORLD and must not be called from anywhere else.

Parameters:
player -

playerLoggedOut

public static void playerLoggedOut(Player player)
This method is called when player leaves the game, which includes just two cases: either player goes back to char selection screen or it's leaving the game [closing client].

NOTICE: This method is called only from AionConnection and CM_QUIT and must not be called from anywhere else

Parameters:
player -

Parameters:
accData - PlayerAccountData
Returns:
True if deletion was successful canceled.

deletePlayer

public static void deletePlayer(PlayerAccountData accData)
Starts player deletion process if its possible. If deletion is possible character should be deleted after 5 minutes.

Parameters:
accData - PlayerAccountData
